--- Testing vgatherdps (gather single-precision floats) ---
Input array: 1.100000 2.200000 3.300000 4.400000 5.500000 6.600000 7.700000 8.800000 inf -inf nan 0.000000 -0.000000 0.000000 99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 2.000000

Gathered result: 2.200000 4.400000 6.600000 8.800000 inf -inf nan 2.000000 
vgatherdps test passed
